title: Define Project Scope and Requirements (Revised)
description: Update the project requirements document for the AISecurityChatbot. The document should include the following sections: chatbot functionality (e.g., natural language processing, knowledge base integration, query handling, error handling), security features (e.g., user authentication, data encryption, access controls, audit logging, incident response integration), integration with existing security systems and tools (SIEM, threat intelligence platforms, incident response workflows, ticketing systems), performance expectations (response times, scalability, availability), user interface design (web-based, mobile app, voice interface, accessibility considerations), data privacy considerations (data storage, retention policies, compliance with regulations, data minimization principles), system architecture design (e.g., frontend, backend, database, microservices architecture), development roadmap, milestones, and timelines for each stage of the project. The document should also outline the testing strategy, acceptance criteria, and quality assurance plan. Once completed, ensure that the document is updated regularly to reflect any changes in requirements or project progress. Please note that the design decisions will need to be made by the code-architect, frontend-developer, backend-developer, database-specialist, and devops-engineer.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the chatbot's components, data flow, and integration with security tools and databases.

title: Develop Natural Language Processing (NLP) Module
description: Implement the NLP module to understand and interpret user queries related to security investigations.

title: Develop Knowledge Base and Information Retrieval
description: Create a knowledge base with security-related information and develop algorithms for retrieving relevant data based on user queries.

title: Implement Chatbot User Interface
description: Design and develop the chatbot's user interface, including input and output mechanisms, and integrate it with the backend components.

title: Develop Security and Access Control Mechanisms
description: Implement security measures, such as authentication, authorization, and data encryption, to ensure the chatbot's integrity and protect sensitive information.

title: Integrate with Existing Security Tools and Databases
description: Develop interfaces and APIs to integrate the chatbot with existing security tools and databases for data exchange and analysis.

title: Set up Development and Testing Environments
description: Configure development and testing environments, including version control, continuous integration, and deployment pipelines.

title: Develop Test Suite and Quality Assurance Plan
description: Create a comprehensive test suite to ensure the chatbot's functionality, performance, and security, and define a quality assurance plan.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Document the chatbot's architecture, components, APIs, and usage instructions for developers, administrators, and end-users.

title: Conduct Security Audits and Penetration Testing
description: Perform security audits and penetration testing to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities in the chatbot system.
dependencies: Develop Security and Access Control Mechanisms

title: Deploy and Monitor the Chatbot System
description: Deploy the chatbot system to production environments, set up monitoring and logging mechanisms, and establish maintenance and support processes.
dependencies: Set up Development and Testing Environments
Conduct Security Audits and Penetration Testing

title: Train and Support End-Users
description: Provide training and support resources for security analysts to effectively use the chatbot and integrate it into their workflows.
